title: Private Bedroom $242/Week or $1075/Month (Ellsworth #10)
posting_body: This is a private room in a re-furbished home.
The home has been built, and designed for communal living.
Tenants share bathrooms, laundry machines and a common kitchen.
The bathrooms, and common areas are cleaned weekly by the management company.
All tenants clean up after themselves as part of their requirements under the lease.
There is a communal kitchen on the first floor, and a shared bathroom on each floor.
First + Last Month (First 3, Last 3 Weeks) due upfront.
Rent is Due on the first Monday of every month, or every Friday if you choose to pay weekly.
The bathroom and common area are cleaned Bi-weekly by the management company.
The building is located on Cottage Street steps from Broadway.
There is easily accessible public transportation, restaurants and many services right out the front door.
Please email using this posting, or CALL.
You can visit <URL> for more information and pictures.
A $40 background check is required before moving into the building.
